name: Adobe Connect
note: Web based version seems to require flash.

name: WhatsApp
note: Linux users may use the web version but it lacks some features like Voice / Video calls.

name: GitHub Desktop
note: A community maintained fork named ShiftKey is available and officially endorsed.

name: Dropbox
note: The Linux version is not feature rich like its other clients. For example: It does not integrate with some popular File Managers like Nemo.

name: ProtonVPN
note: The Linux version is not feature rich like its other clients. For example: It does not support split-tunneling yet.
